title: MAC support for GARENA

embed.description: Chat, message and voice call with your friends. Enjoy the coolest games in town.

body:
Hello, I am from bangkok, Thailand and I play on servers like oceanic and Euw. I own a macbook, and I know that it took long for us to get Mac support for league of legends international servers. I have been trying to get garena to start their support for Mac because here in Asia, we don't have an direct official riot server by riot, however we have garena but they don't support MAC.

My ping for EUW is normally 250-300
My ping for OCE is normally 160-240

I hope you understand what I go through everytime I play League of legends. I would love to play with a low ping of 20 on the Thai or Singapore Servers but I am not able to.

All I am asking you is to please literally SPAM http://intl.garena.com/plus/ and prompt them to Support MAC because ALOT of people own MAC now a days and Its high time they start their support for MAC.

Thank you for reading and I hope you can show your support towards this great cause.
